Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cg6001_17.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'A murky haze clings to the mine tunnels, as if mourning some tragedy.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiFogNew.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'So... after the original child, the one she named Aisling, passed away, Melinoe started raising this "Aisling" instead?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'On the tombstone, the strokes of the meticulously carved name are stained with aged machine oil.'}
{2: '...', 3: '11', 4: 'That seems to be the case.', 5: '11'}
{3: 'Spiders hunt to feed their young. The "child" you have seen in those illusions... they must all be the same.'}
{3: 'They are all the second "Aisling".'}
{3: 'Liv lets out a quiet sigh.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Who is she really? What... exactly is she?', 4: '1'}
{3: "There is no trace of the Punishing Virus on her... unless she's been controlling its dissipation herself."}
{3: "Her disguise was flawless. Under Melinoe's protection, she never revealed a single trace of her true nature."}
{2: 'Maybe... something like the Hetero-Sapien twins?', 3: '22'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "A Hetero-Creature...? That's certainly possible.", 4: '1'}
{3: "If you have already encountered Cradle, it's not a stretch to think the Red Tide could breed something even stranger."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But... why would she want to probe my M.I.N.D.? She even sacrificed this entire nest for it...', 4: '1'}
{2: "Maybe there's something special within your M.I.N.D...", 3: '29'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Could it be... that dataset?', 4: '1'}
{3: "All Constructs have nearly identical M.I.N.D. structures. Except for... that one dataset loaded into Liv's."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But why would a Hetero-Creature... want that dataset?', 4: '1'}
{2: "I'm not sure either.", 3: '38'}
{3: 'No matter how you look at it, the motives don\'t align. Why would a Hetero-Creature "need" that dataset?'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1344.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...For now, our priority is to stop Melinoe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'We have to find that child... the second "Aisling", before she can cause any more harm.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Where could Melinoe be...?', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'A mother... will always do everything she can to buy her child more time to escape.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'She should be waiting for us, just ahead.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
